availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Paul A. Blackwell (Henderson co farmer & banker)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer and banker. Virginia native. Married Martha S. Jones Blackwell in Lunenburg County, Virginia, in 1848. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850. Banker in Henderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 2, stamped p. 315. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 28. Virginia, Marriages, 1740-1850 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 1999. Find A Grave, "Paul A. Blackwell (1826-1910)," Memorial #95043160, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=95043160&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
